EnemyInfo.Name: Etecoon
EnemyInfo.Description:
Harmless monkey creatures that can wall jump back and forth. There are 3 versions of the enemy, but they are not a multipart enemy, so multiples can be included and the order does not matter. The first version plays the initial music, so it's recommended to have only 1 of those.
The etecoons will activate once samus is within 8 tiles horizontal distance (which can be modified at $A7:E9BB, word value in pixels). The etecoons will start moving once samus is withing 4 tiles horizontal distance (modified at $A7:EE49 and $A7:EA56). The etecoons get stunned when an earthquake is active.

Property.Name: Move Pattern
Property.Description: What move pattern the enemy moves in. The first will run off the ledge after walljumping, the second will jump off the ledge after walljumping, and the third will stop moving after walljumping. The first is the one that places the initial music.

Property.Name: Delay
Property.Description: Initial delay in frames before the etecoon starts moving. Can be used to desync the etecoons.
